Good Form.feedback: Correct: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship

AI.feedback: Correct: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work

Original Work.feedback: Correct: this character is not based on any person, place, or existing trope

Poor Taste.feedback: Incorrect: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer

Contrasting Themes.feedback: Incorrect: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures

Shading.feedback: Incorrect: while there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching

Accessible.feedback: Incorrect: the color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character

AI Generated.feedback: Correct: The image is AI generated

Has Grapes.feedback: Correct: The image has green grapes

Has an Orange.feedback: Correct: There is an orange on the ground

Has Healthy Foods.feedback: Correct: The image contains fruits and vegetables

Is a painting.feedback: Incorrect: The image is made by AI, not painted

Is a photo.feedback: Incorrect: The image is made by AI, not a photo

Has Waffles.feedback: Incorrect: There is only fruit in the image

Is Upside Down.feedback: Incorrect: The image shows a bowl that is normally placed

Has Cucumbers.feedback: Incorrect: The image has no cucumbers
